mapper.update: update book set title = #{title}, author = #{author}, publisher = #{publisher}, pubdate = to_date(#{pubdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), price = #{price}, description = #{description} where book_no = #{book_no}
mapper.insert: insert into book (book_no, title, author, publisher, pubdate, description, image, price, cate_no) values (seq_book_no.nextval, #{title}, #{author}, #{publisher}, sysdate, #{description}, #{image}, #{price}, #{cate_no})
